text: Naiset ovat eläneet terrorijärjestö Isisin kalifaatissa. He ovat olleet naimisissa ja saaneet lapsia Isis-terroristien kanssa. Osa on ollut aktiivisesti mukana Isisin toiminnassa.
text_eng: The women lived in the caliphate of the terrorist organisation ISIS. They were married to ISIS terrorists and had children with them. Some of them participated actively in the operations of ISIS.
